name: ML Recommendation System Test
description: Verify that the recommendation system provides accurate and relevant suggestions
prerequisites: User account with listening history, and test access to the recommendation system API

steps.action: Log in to the Audotics application with a test account that has listening history
steps.expected: Login succeeds and user is redirected to the dashboard
steps.notes: Use test account test-user-5@audotics.com with password Test1234!

steps.action: Navigate to the 'For You' or recommendations section
steps.expected: Recommendations page loads with personalized content
steps.notes: This may take a few seconds as recommendations are generated

steps.action: Verify that recommendations include a mix of familiar and new content
steps.expected: Recommendation list includes some artists/songs from user history and some new discoveries
steps.notes: According to requirements, at least 30% should be new content

steps.action: Check for explanation labels on recommendations
steps.expected: Each recommendation has a short explanation of why it was recommended
steps.notes: Look for text like 'Because you listened to X' or 'Similar to Y'

steps.action: Create a new group session and invite another test user
steps.expected: Group session is created and invitation is sent
steps.notes: Can use test-user-6@audotics.com as the other test user

steps.action: Navigate to the group recommendations section in the session
steps.expected: Group recommendations page loads, showing 'Generating recommendations...' initially
steps.notes: This may take up to 10 seconds as the ML processes both users' preferences

steps.action: Verify that group recommendations blend preferences from both users
steps.expected: Recommendations include items that appear in both users' histories or similar items
steps.notes: Check the ML logs for confidence scores if available

steps.action: Interact with a recommendation (like, add to playlist, or skip)
steps.expected: Action is recorded and subsequent recommendations adjust based on the interaction
steps.notes: You may need to refresh or wait for the next recommendation batch

steps.expected: Recommendations span multiple genres, eras, or styles rather than being too similar
steps.notes: Look for at least 3 different genres in the top 10 recommendations

steps.action: Time how long it takes to generate a new set of recommendations
steps.expected: New recommendations should load in under 3 seconds for individual users, under 5 seconds for groups
steps.notes: Record the actual time to verify performance requirements

steps.action: Check API response times in the browser developer tools
steps.expected: API calls to the recommendation endpoints should complete in under 1000ms
steps.notes: Use the Network tab in browser developer tools

steps.action: Verify that recommendations maintain quality with a cold start (new user)
steps.expected: Even with limited history, recommendations should appear reasonable
steps.notes: Log out and create a new test account to verify this
